The Oblitercons/Scattershot:



Dark One watched Ultracon, Stegotron, and Triceradon on other Alliance 
members.
"So stupid." Dark One chuckled, raising his rifle.  Firing two plasma bolts 
off at Ultracon's chest.

Breakdown fired a grenade from his launcher off at Stegotron's pelvis.

Scavenger raised his chain gun, firing 21 armor-piercing rounds at 
Triceradon's torso.

Hiss fired a fusion blast at Stegotron's chest.

Pyro fired a "continuous" burst of flames at Stegotron's legs.

Scattershot took flight, picking a target.
